readable.title: 2868668723_0741222b23
readable.content: A boy is hanging upside down from a tire swing . a boy is swinging upside-down with his head sticking through a tire . A child upside down in a horizontal tire swing . A young boy is hanging head down in a tire swing with gravel beneath it . A young boy wearing a grey sweater , blue jeans and boots hangs upside down in a tire swing .
